row.entry: Item Name
Description
Properties
Child Items
ButtonGroup is a widget with a group of buttons.
ComboBox is a combined button and popup list.
ContextMenu provides a context (popup) menu widget.
Creates modeless and modal dialogs.
Xml document instance interface
GridLayout lines up child items in a table manner.
GridWidget is a cell of GridLayout. Grid Widget is placed in its row and column of GridLayout accordingto the properties.
Label is a text label with an optional outline and arbitrary background color.
Layout lines up child items horizontally or vertically.
LineEdit is a one-line text editor.
ListView provides a list/tree view.
ListViewItem provides item for ListView.
MainMenu provides menu bar for MainWindow.
MainWindow of Serna Application.
MenuButton provides buttons (similar to ToolButton) suitable for MainMenu.
MenuItem provides menu item for MainMenu, PopupMenu and ContextMenu.
MenuSeparator inserts separator into menus. Is is suitable for PopupMenus andContextMenus.
PopupMenu provides a popup menu widget. PopupMenu can have PopupMenu as a child.
PushButton provides a command button, usually used in Dialog.
RadioButton provides a radio button with a text or label.
Splitter provides splitter widget.
StatusBar is a horizontal bar at the bottom of MainWindow suitable for presenting status information.
Stack of tabbed items.
ToolBar - dockable tool panel containing widgets such as tool buttons.
ToolBarSeparator inserts separator into ToolBar.
ToolBox provides a column of tabbed widget items.
ToolButton provides a quick-access button, usually used inside a ToolBar.
Placeholder for other items

refnamediv.refpurpose: ButtonGroup is a widget with a group of buttons.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: ButtonGroup is a grouping widget (that may contain buttons) with an optional title.

formalpara.title: after
formalpara.para: Specifies after which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: before
formalpara.para: Specifies before which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: icon
formalpara.para: Icon shown in widget or menu item.

formalpara.title: inscription
formalpara.para: Text shown in widget or menu item.

formalpara.title: is-enabled
formalpara.para: Controls whether widget provided by UI item is enabled or disabled (grayed out)

formalpara.title: is-visible
formalpara.para: Controls whether the items is visible or not.

formalpara.title: name
formalpara.para: Ui item name. Name is unique among descendants of Document.

formalpara.title: parent
formalpara.para: Specifies inside which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: title
formalpara.para: Title shown at the top of button group.

formalpara.title: tooltip
formalpara.para: Text of tooltip that will be shown for UI item widget.

formalpara.title: accel

formalpara.para: Binds ui item and an action it calls.

formalpara.para: Name of child action or property aggregation for child action.

formalpara.para: Specifies icon shown in MenuItem, ToolButton, PushButton, etc.

formalpara.para: Specifies text displayed for MenuItem, Label, TabWidget etc.

formalpara.title: tooltip
formalpara.para: Specifies tooltip used in widgets.

formalpara.title: insertion-policy
formalpara.para: Specifies insertion policy for editable combo box. "no-insertion" is default value, otherwise new input value is appended to the list.

formalpara.title: is-editable
formalpara.para: Specifies if the combo box is editable or not.

formalpara.title: is-toggleable
formalpara.para: Controls whether ui control (MenuItem, PushButton, ToolButton) can be toggled on/off.

formalpara.title: is-toggled
formalpara.para: Is ui control currently toggled on. This property takes effect only if "is-toggled" is "true"

refnamediv.refpurpose: Creates modeless and modal dialogs.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Dialog is used to cover simple use-cases for interaction with users.

formalpara.title: after
formalpara.para: Specifies after which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: before
formalpara.para: Specifies before which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: caption
formalpara.para: Caption of the dialog.

formalpara.title: height
formalpara.para: Height of the Dialog in pixels.

formalpara.title: icon
formalpara.para: Icon shown in widget or menu item.

formalpara.para: Text shown in widget or menu item.

formalpara.title: is-enabled
formalpara.para: Controls whether widget provided by UI item is enabled or disabled (grayed out)

formalpara.title: is-modal
formalpara.para: is-modal is "true" for modal Dialog

formalpara.para: Controls whether the items is visible or not.

formalpara.title: name
formalpara.para: Ui item name. Name is unique among descendants of Document.

formalpara.para: Specifies inside which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: tooltip
formalpara.para: Text of tooltip that will be shown for UI item widget.

formalpara.title: width
formalpara.para: Width of the Dialog in pixels.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Xml document instance interface

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Document keeps all items representing user interface of the specific document instance. Number and types of children may depend on certain document type.

refnamediv.refpurpose: GridLayout lines up child items in a table manner.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: GridLayout divides given space into rows and columns, and puts each child (GridWidget) into the certain cell.

formalpara.title: after
formalpara.para: Specifies after which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: before
formalpara.para: Specifies before which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: col-num
formalpara.para: Number of columns in a grid.

formalpara.title: icon
formalpara.para: Icon shown in widget or menu item.

formalpara.title: inscription
formalpara.para: Text shown in widget or menu item.

formalpara.title: is-enabled
formalpara.para: Controls whether widget provided by UI item is enabled or disabled (grayed out)

formalpara.title: is-visible
formalpara.para: Controls whether the items is visible or not.

formalpara.title: margin
formalpara.para: Specifies (outer) space around all items.

formalpara.title: name
formalpara.para: Ui item name. Name is unique among descendants of Document.

formalpara.title: parent
formalpara.para: Specifies inside which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: row-num
formalpara.para: Number of rows in a grid.

formalpara.title: spacing
formalpara.para: Specifies space between items in Layout.

formalpara.title: tooltip
formalpara.para: Text of tooltip that will be shown for UI item widget.

refnamediv.refpurpose: GridWidget is a cell of GridLayout. Grid Widget is placed in its row and column of GridLayout according to the properties.

formalpara.para: Specifies inside which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: size-policy
formalpara.para: Specifies resizing of Label. By default the value is "ignored",which defines the fixed geometry. Otherwise the size is determined by text size.

formalpara.title: tooltip
formalpara.para: Text of tooltip that will be shown for UI item widget.

formalpara.title: width
formalpara.para: Specifies width of the Label.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Layout lines up child items horizontally or vertically.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Layout divides the space it gets (from its parent item) into a row of boxes, and places each child item in its cell.

refnamediv.refpurpose: LineEdit is a one-line text editor.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: LineEdit is a simple one-line text editor. It is used mainly in Dialog items.

refnamediv.refpurpose: ListView provides a list/tree view.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: ListView can display a hierarchy of multi-column items. User may select one or many items (depending on the SelectionMode) and sort the list in increasing or decreasing order by any column.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: ListViewItem provides item for ListView. It can display data (icon and/or text) in multiple columns.

refnamediv.refpurpose: MainWindow of Serna Application.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: There are different meanings of MainWindow from the *.SUI and *.SPD points of view.

From *.SUI point MainWindow represents main window of Serna Application. There are several MainWindow items allowed at a time. Each MainWindow can have several Document items which represent a specific document instances.

From *.SPD point MainWindow is a Document. This is because plugin is loaded for current Document instance and other Documents are irrelevant for the UI instantiation. MainWindow and its children represent a view (UI) for specific document and its type.

refnamediv.refpurpose: RadioButton provides a radio button with a text or label.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: RadioButtons should be a children of GroupBox to provide a "one of many" choice functionality.

formalpara.title: inscription
formalpara.para: Specifies text displayed for MenuItem, Label, TabWidget etc.

formalpara.title: is-enabled
formalpara.para: Specifies whether ui item is enabled.

formalpara.title: name
formalpara.para: Specifies name for UiItems and UiActions.

formalpara.title: tooltip
formalpara.para: Specifies tooltip used in widgets.

formalpara.title: after
formalpara.para: Specifies after which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: before
formalpara.para: Specifies before which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: icon
formalpara.para: Icon shown in widget or menu item.

formalpara.title: inscription
formalpara.para: Text shown in widget or menu item.

formalpara.title: is-enabled
formalpara.para: Controls whether widget provided by UI item is enabled or disabled (grayed out)

formalpara.title: is-toggleable
formalpara.para: Controls whether ui control (MenuItem, PushButton, ToolButton) can be toggled on/off.

formalpara.title: is-toggled
formalpara.para: Is ui control currently toggled on. This property takes effect only if "is-toggled" is "true"

formalpara.title: is-visible
formalpara.para: Controls whether the items is visible or not.

formalpara.title: name
formalpara.para: Ui item name. Name is unique among descendants of Document.

formalpara.title: parent
formalpara.para: Specifies inside which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: tooltip
formalpara.para: Text of tooltip that will be shown for UI item widget.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Splitter provides splitter widget.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Splitter lays out its children horizontally or vertically, depending on "orientation" property.

formalpara.title: after
formalpara.para: Specifies after which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: before
formalpara.para: Specifies before which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: icon
formalpara.para: Icon shown in widget or menu item.

formalpara.para: Text shown in widget or menu item.

formalpara.title: is-enabled
formalpara.para: Controls whether widget provided by UI item is enabled or disabled (grayed out)

formalpara.title: is-visible
formalpara.para: Controls whether the items is visible or not.

formalpara.title: name
formalpara.para: Ui item name. Name is unique among descendants of Document.

formalpara.title: orientation
formalpara.para: Specifies orientation of laid out items.

formalpara.title: parent
formalpara.para: Specifies inside which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: proportions
formalpara.para: Space delimited integers specify the geometric proportions for child items.

formalpara.title: tooltip
formalpara.para: Text of tooltip that will be shown for UI item widget.

refnamediv.refpurpose: StatusBar is a horizontal bar at the bottom of MainWindow suitable for presenting status information.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Stack of tabbed items.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: TabWidget organizes its children as a stack with one child visible at a time. Current (visible) item can be chosen via tab bar at a top (or bottom - depending on properties) of TabWidget.

formalpara.title: after
formalpara.para: Specifies after which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: before
formalpara.para: Specifies before which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

refnamediv.refpurpose: ToolBar - dockable tool panel containing widgets such as tool buttons.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: ToolBar keeps ToolButtons and other relatively simple UI controls: labels, combo-boxes, line-edits etc.

formalpara.title: after
formalpara.para: Specifies after which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: before
formalpara.para: Specifies before which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: caption
formalpara.para: Caption for the ToolBar is shown when it is undocked.

formalpara.title: dock-edge
formalpara.para: Specifies the docking position of the ToolBar.

formalpara.title: horizontally-stretchable
formalpara.para: Specifies if the ToolBar is horizontally stretchable .

formalpara.title: icon
formalpara.para: Icon shown in widget or menu item.

formalpara.title: inscription
formalpara.para: Text shown in widget or menu item.

formalpara.title: is-enabled
formalpara.para: Controls whether widget provided by UI item is enabled or disabled (grayed out)

formalpara.title: is-visible
formalpara.para: Controls whether the items is visible or not.

formalpara.title: name
formalpara.para: Ui item name. Name is unique among descendants of Document.

formalpara.title: parent
formalpara.para: Specifies inside which uiItem this uiItem should be placed.

formalpara.title: resize-enabled
formalpara.para: Specifies whether the ToolBar can be resized or is fixed-size.

formalpara.title: tooltip
formalpara.para: Text of tooltip that will be shown for UI item widget.

formalpara.title: vertically-stretchable
formalpara.para: Specifies if the ToolBar is vertically stretchable .

refnamediv.refpurpose: ToolBarSeparator inserts separator into ToolBar.

refnamediv.refpurpose: ToolBox provides a column of tabbed widget items.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: ToolBox provides a widget that displays a column of tabs one above the other, with the current item displayed below the current tab.

refnamediv.refpurpose: ToolButton provides a quick-access button, usually used inside a ToolBar.

formalpara.title: accel
formalpara.para: keyboard accelerator (shortcut keys).

formalpara.title: action
formalpara.para: Binds ui item and an action it calls.

formalpara.title: action
formalpara.para: Name of child action or property aggregation for child action.
